name: The Lord of the Llamas
description: The Lord of the Llamas rules over Mordor unlike any llama before him. He takes immense pride in his appearance and reputation, donning only the finest golden armor, and showing off his dragon collection, allowing them to fly freely around the volcanic lands. This, of course, is terrible for the sustainability of the city, and citizens are never safe from a casual mid-morning blaze, but the llama lord doesn’t mind, as it only increases his subjects’ fear of his power.
